Posts.Title: Blurry vision ruffy ruffy

Posts.Content: Nov 22, 2011 03:52PM ruffy wrote: I hope that some dr's will still continue to do cbe's on their patiets despite the new reccomendations. I was diagnosed at 37, no family hx, had my son at 23 and breast fed him for two years, I was very low risk for getting BC. And it doesn't seem like I'm alone, alot of young women with no risk factors seem to be getting diagnosed. :( I hope dr's realize this and continue to do cbe's. It just makes sense.
